Plotting kde1d objects

Source: R/kde1d.R
plot.kde1d.Rd

Plotting kde1d objects

# S3 method for kde1d
plot(x, ...)

# S3 method for kde1d
lines(x, ...)

Arguments

x

kde1d object.

...

further arguments passed to plot.default.

See also

kde1d lines.kde1d

Examples

data(wdbc)  # load data
fit <- kde1d(wdbc[, 7])  # estimate density
plot(fit)  # plot density estimate


fit2 <- kde1d(as.ordered(wdbc[, 1])) # discrete variable
plot(fit2, col = 2)
